title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.3 - Establishment of procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.3 - Establishment of procedures

State Regulations

The department will accept and process applications made
pursuant to sections
111-m
and
111-n
of
the Social Services Law, and in accordance with the provisions of this Part, for the purpose of satisfying past-due support obligations through the offset
of New York State income tax refunds and city income/earnings tax refunds due
as a result of overpayments made to the New York State Department of Taxation
and Finance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
345.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
